description:
Bad Dream
In the strange dream that Fumi has, an unknown cone-shaped object walks with her. When it eats a stone, it splits into two. Fumi wakes up frightened, but...
A Man`s Diet
Dad gets a big shock when Fumi pokes at his stomach and calls it blubbery. Dad gives his all to the challenge, but...
Professor Dinosaur, Go!
Mom arrives at the dinosaur museum with Bunji and Daichi. As usual, the simple-minded Bunji walks in, but Daichi surprisingly knows a lot about dinosaurs!
With Grandma
One day after the sun starts to set and everyone else is out, Fumi and Grandma are at home. They sit on the porch side by side, eating snacks and talking at the same time. A relaxed atmosphere is flowing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bad Dream / Man`s Diet / Professor Dinosaur, Go! / With Grandma
悪夢 / 男の減量 / 恐竜博へGO! / おばあちゃん, と
